title: Beach Cleanup!
description: Join us for a fun day cleaning up the beach! We will provide bags, but feel free to bring your own. Meet us at the East Greenwhich state beach lot at 9am.

title: Cleanup Challenge
description: In honor of Earth Day, we are challenging our community to pick up as much litter as we can. The winner with the most trash in lbs will recieve a 25$ Dunkin gift card!

title: Save the turtles
description: Join us to help save marine life by cleaning trash and building protected areas on the beach for wildlife to reproduce safely!

title: No more cans
description: Join us to help clean the beach from the 4th of july removing as much trash as possible from people celabrating!
